item.title: letter shop
item.description: What This post describes a made up application - Letter Shop, why I created it and how it was done. tl;dr TCK code API code Why Letter Shop is an attempt to make comparison of concepts possible, of course in a very practical way. I wanted to have some api/tests/problem that I can implement with different approaches (like using monads, using event sourcing, etc.
